    • Description

    The Lenovo K10 Note will be your go-to device for gaming and entertainment, thanks to its amazing set of features, including the Snapdragon 710 processor, Dolby Audio, and Dewdrop display. You can even click beautiful pictures of your friends and scenic places using this smartphone’s AI triple-lens rear camera (16 MP + 5 MP + 8 MP) and 16 MP front camera.

    Read More
    Product Description
    AI Triple-lens Rear Camera

    Capture wonderful snapshots with the help of this smartphone’s AI triple-lens camera (16 MP + 5 MP + 8 MP). You can even capture intricate details by zooming in (2x zoom) while shooting.

    Snapdragon 710 Processor

    Enjoy gaming and entertainment on this smartphone, as it is powered by the Snapdragon 710 processor.

    High-capacity Battery

    Enjoy uninterrupted gaming, browsing, and more with this phone, without worrying about the charge remaining, thanks to its high-capacity 4050 mAh battery.

    Super Night Mode

    The Super Night mode, powered by AI technology with pixel-level multi-frame alignment, lets you click crisp images even under low-lit conditions.

    Dewdrop Display

    Get set for a completely immersive viewing experience with this phone’s 16 cm (6.3) Dewdrop notch screen with a 90% screen-to-body ratio and an aspect ratio of 19.5:9.

    Gradient Design

    This smartphone will look good, wherever you place it, thanks to its elegant gradient design.

    16 MP Front Camera

    With the facial recognition feature and the bokeh effect, this smartphone’s 16 MP front camera lets you click great selfies.

    Dolby Audio

    From your favourite shows to your most-played games, everything will seem more alive on this smartphone, thanks to the presence of the Dolby Atmos audio.

    Google Assistant

    Right from getting directions to playing music, you can use the Google Assistant to multitask on the go. You can get answers to your questions by just asking - you can say “Ok Google” or long-press the home button. Also, the Google Assistant is available in different languages like English, Hindi and much more.

    Worth the money

    After using the phone for about a week, I am to opine that though body of the phone is made of plastic, the finishing is good and it's well built. The display is quite good being a Lcd screen. The auto brightness or adaptive brightness could have been better optimised.
